nodes.text: Thoret was a group of Delta-class JV-7 escort shuttles affiliated with pirates.

Deployed from the container transport Thor, the shuttles carried pilots for the idle TIE/D Defenders of Baker and Charly group parked at a staging area. An Imperial raid on this area was one of the early uses of the Missile Boat.
In 3 ABY, Imperial pilot Maarek Stele participated in an Imperial Navy combat simulation of this raid.
